name: Beachside Backpackers
description:
Winner of Hostel World's best small hostel in Oceania 2024

Beachside Backpackers has all the free stuff you could possibly desire. Free unlimited high-speed WiFi , free coffee and tea, free professional pool table, Free Nintendo Switch with Mario cart, FIFA and everything in-between, professional Italian foosball table, free Stan (like Netflix), 11am checkout of room, free book exchange/ board games, quizzes, pool/ foosball comps and much more. We also offer $15 surfboard hire and $10 bodyboard hire. If you're lucky the old hostel matron Chilli the dog will grace you with her presence or the friendly chunky neighborhood cat. 
 
About the hostel

Sorry, we do not accept children in the hostel.

We are the youngest, funnest, and funkiest hostel in town. We love a few drinks, great music and a dash of art. If you are looking to meet new people, have a laugh, and to be a part of great activities then come join the fun.

Our location is perfect; we are the closest hostel to everything that matters. We are the only hostel within easy walking distance to the beach and koala hospital, we are also the closest hostel to the bars and town center. Just check out our location on the hostel map view thingy! We are not the closest hostel to Mordor if you happen to have a ring you are trying to dispose of.

Like you, we want to keep the world healthy; which is why we get our power directly from the sun via our recently installed solar panels. We also have filtered rainwater tanks for our showers and bathroom sinks.

24 hour kitchen and lounge area are yours. Our main aim is to make you feel like the hostel is your home too.

We created this hostel for you. Yes, specifically for you. If you choose a different hostel it will be like we planned you a party and you didn't show up. 

We are young backpackers who simply love backpacking, we are creating the type of hostel we love finding in our adventures around the world. For this reason the hostel has a very unique atmosphere. Our focus is on creating a nice friendly environment where people can meet other guests easily, whether it be over a beer or through various activities. 

We also wanted a hostel with great art. A good friend of ours recently won the Australian Raw awards visual artist of the year - she has been furiously painting all types of beauty on our walls. 


So if you are a little adventures, a little quirky, and want something different than your average 'Mr Monopoly' hostel, then come join us.

Welcome Vlkommen Bienvenue Huan ying Vitejte Velkommen Welkom Bonvenon Tere tulemast Tervetuloa Wolkom Willkommen 

Our target market is Backpackers between the ages of 18-35. While we are happy to accept guests outside this age group (and some of our most amazing guests have been older), older guests should be aware that we are structured to appeal to a younger market. So if you are young at heart, arty and alternative - please join us, However if you are looking for a more big chain type hostel - then please seek accommodation at one of the other great hostels in town.

*There is on occasion a well behaved doggo here.  She loves a good yarn with guests but sorry if you are allergic 

Please let us know if your arrival time is after midnight as we will need to send you our door codes and late check in procedures . :)

If you're arriving on the 5am bus and have not paid for the previous night you unfortunately can't access the hostel before 8,00 am as sometimes we need to sleep :) You can however use the comfy lounges on the side of the building, Alternatively, you can also watch the sunrise over the ocean only 5 minutes away.

This hostel has a 24 hour no cancellation policy.

houseRules.notes:
Late Check-in available.
Please let us know your arrival time if you are arriving after 1am at night as we might need to send you our door code. :)

Our ideal guests are young, easy-going, open-minded travellers. The hostel is not suitable for children. 

Our target market is Backpackers between the ages of 18-35. While we are happy to accept guests outside this age group (and some of our most amazing guests have been older), older guests should be aware that we are structured to appeal to a younger market. So if you are young at heart, arty and alternative - please join us, However if you are looking for a more big chain type hostel - then please seek accommodation at one of the other great hostels in town.

*There is a well behaved puppy here.  She loves walks with guests but sorry if you are allergic 

Please let us know your arrival time if you are arriving after 2am at night as we might need to send you our door code. :)

If you're arriving on the 5am bus and have not paid for the previous night you can't access the hostel before 9:00 am as sometimes we need to sleep :) You can come up to the hostel, there are comfy lounges on the side of the building, you can also watch the sunrise over the ocean only 5 minutes away and there is  great coffee shop not far from the hostel.

This hostel has a 24 hour no cancellation policy.
